title: Sally
body:
<<setSallyAction("talk")>>
<<if visited("Sally") is false>>
    Sally: Oh! Hi.
    Sally: You snuck up on me.
    Sally: Don't do that.
<<else>>
    Player: Hey.
    Sally: Hi.
<<endif>>
<<setSallyAction("default")>>

<<if visited("Sally.Watch") is false>>
    [[Anything exciting happen on your watch?|Sally.Watch]]
<<endif>>
<<if $sally_warning is true and visited("Sally.Sorry") is false>>
    [[Sorry about the console.|Sally.Sorry]]
<<endif>>
[[See you later.|Sally.Exit]]

title: Sally.Watch
body:
<<setSallyAction("talk")>>
Sally: Not really.
Sally: Same old nebula, doing the same old thing.
Sally: Oh, Ship wanted to see you. Go say hi to it.
<<set $should_see_ship to true>>
<<if visited("Ship") is true>>
    Player: Already done!
    Sally: Go say hi again.
<<endif>>
[[Sally.Reset]]

title: Sally.Sorry
body:
<<setSallyAction("angry")>>
Sally: Yeah. Don't do it again.
[[Sally.Reset]]
